entry.message: [info] Activation of plug-in DQC Rules Validator successful, version Check version using Tools->DQC->Version on the GUI or --dqc-version on the command line. - validate/DQC

[DQC.IFRS.0102.9546] Cash flows from (used in) investing activities with a value of -3,548,791,000 is not equal to the combined total of Cash flows from (used in) investing activities, continuing operations and Cash flows from (used in) investing activities, discontinued operations ( -3,531,241,000 + 17,550,000 ) with a value of -3,513,691,000.
These values should be equal. The properties of this ifrs-full:CashFlowsFromUsedInInvestingActivities fact are: Period :2021-01-01 to 2021-12-31 Dimensions : Unit : BRL Decimals of Cash flows from (used in) investing activities : -3 Decimals of Cash flows from (used in) investing activities, continuing operations : -3 Decimals of Cash flows from (used in) investing activities, discontinued operations : -3
